5e6cee9d-efba-464d-9ded-316dc4b57ee8.description: Believe Leadership Students who participate in the Public Speaking Workshop can receive this badge. Students will be building their public speaking skills and engaging with the Believe Leadership Community to continue to develop those skills in different activities.
5e6cee9d-efba-464d-9ded-316dc4b57ee8.name: Believe Leadership Public Speaking Workshop

badge_template_activities.title: Participated in the Believe Leadership Public Speaking Workshop. Learned tips and tricks related to public speaking and presenting to an audience. Engaged with other peers during the session to practice their skills and further develop what they have learned. Students receiving this badge participated in the entire Public Speaking Session and are actively participating in the Believe Leadership Course.

425ff9e3-731d-4a10-b1ec-8fa8b3482818.description: As a Chapter Head, the badge earner has successfully run and managed the 10-week leadership program at their school. Chapter Heads oversee the logistics of setting up their Chapter and recruiting members. Chapter Heads then teach leadership lessons to members, and guide members to apply these lessons to a Believe Passion Project. The badge earner has demonstrated the ability to educate their peers and facilitate a supportive environment, exhibiting strong leadership skills and accountability.
425ff9e3-731d-4a10-b1ec-8fa8b3482818.name: Believe Leadership Course Chapter Head 2021-22

badge_template_activities.title: Teach leadership lessons to members and guide members to apply these lessons to a Believe Passion Project. Lessons are delivered either to group virtually or in a classroom.
Organize and facilitate Inspiration Fair at end of program to showcase member's Passion Projects and celebrate member's accomplishments.
Communicate frequently with Believe Leadership Admin and complete check-in's in order to ensure progress and accountability.
Utilize social media and other promotional methods in order to recruit members and showcase Chapter's progress throughout the program.

Coordinate logistics of initiating and running Chapter at their school. Tasks may include registering club, finding teacher supervisor, scheduling meetings, supervising peers, and problem solving. These require time management and organization skills.
Complete Chapter Head Training prior to initiating Chapter at their school. Training involves program logistics, lesson materials, and how to lead and facilitate sessions with members.
Current High School Student

db13e09b-1ed4-4f36-9f20-4fec4118fac6.description: As a Project Finalist, the badge earner was an active participant of the Believe Leadership Course and was selected as the top project from their respective Believe Leadership Chapter. The Project Finalist was tasked with leveraging a passion they have, to find a creative solution to a problem, resulting in their own unique Passion Project. The Project Finalist was then invited to present their Passion Project and results at a nation-wide Collective Inspiration Fair.
db13e09b-1ed4-4f36-9f20-4fec4118fac6.name: Believe Leadership Course Project Finalist

badge_template_activities.title: Active participant of the Believe Leadership Course. Attended weekly leadership sessions on topics such as: innovation & creativity, discipline, teamwork & collaboration, confidence, resilience, and leadership.

Developed a Passion Project by leveraging a passion they have, to solve a problem they care about in their school or community. The badge earner developed an action plan for their Passion Project, implemented the idea, and measured the impact of their project.
The Project Finalist was invited to present their Passion Project at the nationwide Collective Inspiration Fair where they presented their idea to a large virtual audience.
Submitted project outline and multimedia submission about Passion Project.
Current High School student and Member of a Believe Leadership Chapter at their school.

2531d046-e201-473a-b61a-99bcacf79f87.description: The Believe Impact Program is a leadership & development program that certifies employees in Inspirational Leadership. Participants complete the Leadership Sessions and create an impact project that links a personal passion to company purpose and DEI initiatives. Graduates of the Believe Impact Program display inspirational leadership and find more ways to connect with their customers and colleagues, they build stronger relationships across teams, and they find greater meaning in their work.
2531d046-e201-473a-b61a-99bcacf79f87.name: Believe Impact Program Inspirational Leader

badge_template_activities.title: Develop and implement an Impact Project that aligns with company purpose and activates DEI initiatives. Participants inspire their teams and live their values through this work, and as a result exemplify inspirational leadership.

Attend Leadership Training Sessions that help build skills such as: how to personalize any goal, increase team engagement, intentionally design your support network, enable others to take action, be resilient, maintain high performance, and more!

Participants learn how to refine and craft their own "signature story" in order to leverage their Impact Project for colleague and customer connection. This is showcased in a presentation at the program wrap up event "Celebrate Impact Day" in front of the broader organization.
Increase performance level by learning how to: find ways to connect with customers and colleagues, build stronger relationships, find more meaning in their work, and fuel their goals.

a157bc34-851e-48a6-b000-81ecb39b1826.description: Strategies to Maximize Motivation in Your Students - The effects of COVID have slowed the momentum of school activities and student motivation. This workshop is designed to give educators strategies to re-ignite the motivation in our students and remind them that they get out what they put into their high school experience. Participants have learned principles of an Olympic mindset and best practices from the Believe Initiative.
a157bc34-851e-48a6-b000-81ecb39b1826.name: School Engagement Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Strategies to enhance school culture and school cohesiveness by engaging more students.
Tactics to recruit students for leadership roles and involve students in decision making processes.
Learned how to re-ignite the action muscle in your students.
Shared best practices on what has worked to help students deal with overwhelm to return to school life.

029952ff-5a5d-41b7-9a85-0999b337055c.description: The Student Director badge earner is an integral member of the BLC Admin team. The Student Director oversees dozens of individual BLC Chapters and Chapter Heads in order to monitor their progress and ensure they successfully pass all the key program milestones. They are competent in skills such as leadership, mentorship, problem solving, social media management, and program development. They exhibit exceptional levels of organization, time management skills, and consistent dedication to the BLC.
029952ff-5a5d-41b7-9a85-0999b337055c.name: Believe Leadership Course Student Director

badge_template_activities.title: Management and oversight of Believe Leadership Chapter Heads and Chapters. This includes on-going support, guidance, mentorship, problem solving, database management, and progress tracking.
Contribute to new content ideas, program development, promotional content, social media campaigns, and other aspects relating to the development of the Believe Leadership Program.
Communication and collaborate with Believe Initiative organization. Primary liaison between Chapter Heads and Believe Initiative.
Able to lead workshops with large audiences, as well as lead meetings, run office hours, and speak during virtual events.
Previous experience as Believe Leadership Chapter Head
Current High School student
